rows.label: tlk70000069_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Did you get the hankering to
search for treasure again?

rows.label: tlk70000069_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Hm? You're looking for the capital city?
When you came out of Braying Canyon, did
you see a tower-looking building?

rows.label: tlk70000069_01_msg0003
rows.name:
That's Aurium Palace in the Iira
capital. If you head toward it,
you'll reach the city eventually.

rows.label: tlk70000069_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Careful, though. The monsters in Dannagh
Desert are a ferocious bunch. You have
to be to survive out here...
